agents.name: KushoAI
agents.shortDescription: Get 100+ ready-to-run functional tests for your APIs in minutes
agents.longDescription: Kusho is an AI Agent for API testing. It generates an exhaustive test suite for your API in 2 minutes– just put in an API spec and get a host of functional tests covering real-world scenarios. Run these tests with AI-generated assertions in a single-click.
keyFeatures: Single-click Input in multiple formats - Import OpenAPI specs Postman Collections cURL Commands directly in to KushoAI,
Scenario Planning -  Our trained LLMs plan all possible test scenarios for your APIs in seconds,
AI-Written Tests - Our reliable models write test code for all scenarios,
Executing tests - With our next-generation AI you can even execute all tests from the web-app or autonomously from your CI/CD pipeline,
Gen AI to assertions -  You can check for accuracy reliability and performance with a single click.
useCases: Performing API testing for your backend code end-to-end, Executing test code for your APIs, Finding bugs in your APIs before production, Auto-updating your tests, Ensuring 100% test automation coverage
agents.tags: AI coding, API testing, AI Agent, LLM, AI native, developer productivity, developer tools, software testing, quality assurance, SaaS

agents.name: Momentic AI
agents.longDescription: Momentic is an advanced AI platform for software testing that automates end-to-end (E2E), UI, API, and accessibility testing. It uses AI to streamline the testing process, allowing developers to create and maintain tests more efficiently. The platform integrates into existing workflows and aims to reduce the time and resources spent on testing while improving software quality.
agents.tags: AI-powered testing, software development, automation, quality assurance, DevOps

agents.name: Linear
agents.shortDescription: Streamlined issue tracking and project management for software teams
agents.longDescription: Linear is a purpose-built tool for modern product development, offering streamlined issue tracking, project management, and roadmapping features. It aims to help software teams plan, track, and ship products more efficiently with a focus on speed and simplicity.
agents.tags: Project management, Issue tracking, Software development, Agile methodology, Collaboration tools

agents.name: Amplify Security
agents.longDescription: Amplify Security has created a dual AI Agent platform that fixes insecure code before its deployed into production. This eliminates the work developers had to do around security. Now developers can focus on building products without slowing down for security issues or worse, causing a breach.

agents.name: Owlity
agents.shortDescription: The world’s first autonomous AI-driven QA solution
agents.longDescription:
We put our 15 years of experience in AI QA SaaS that is better than your QA department. It clearly knows what, when and how to test. You don't have to have any QA knowledge.

Just put URL of your web app and get a test report. Simple and comprehensive.
agents.tags: AI testing, software testing, QA AI solution

agents.name: TestSprite
agents.shortDescription: The First Fully Autonomous End-to-End AI Testing Agent
agents.longDescription: TestSprite is a fully autonomous AI testing agent that handles the entire testing process — from generating test cases to writing test code, diagnosing issues, and even proposing fixes. With TestSprite, we aimed to make testing completely hands-off for developers, freeing them up to focus on building amazing products.
keyFeatures: TestSprite is a fully autonomous AI testing agent that handles the entire testing process — from generating test cases to writing test code, diagnosing issues, and even proposing fixes. With TestSprite, we aimed to make testing completely hands-off for developers, freeing them up to focus on building amazing products.
useCases: TestSprite is a fully autonomous AI testing agent that handles the entire testing process — from generating test cases to writing test code, diagnosing issues, and even proposing fixes. With TestSprite, we aimed to make testing completely hands-off for developers, freeing them up to focus on building amazing products.

agents.name: Latta AI
agents.shortDescription: Solving Bugs takes 40% of developers' time in general. Save that time right now.
agents.longDescription: Solving Bugs takes 40% of developers' time in general. Find bugs automatically bugs without looking at code.

agents.name: Hercules
agents.shortDescription: World's first open source end to end testing agent
agents.longDescription: Testing modern web applications can be difficult, with frequent changes and complex features making it hard to keep up. That’s where Hercules comes in. Hercules is the world’s first open-source testing agent, built to handle the toughest testing tasks so you don’t have to. It turns simple, easy-to-write Gherkin steps into fully automated end to end tests—no coding skills needed. Whether you’re working with tricky platforms like Salesforce or running tests in your CI/CD pipeline, Hercules adapts to your needs and takes care of the details. With Hercules, testing becomes simple, reliable, and efficient, helping teams everywhere deliver better software.
keyFeatures: Takes gherkin tests and runs them autonomously
useCases: Run end to end tests autonomously
